actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to authorize deduction from gross income for certain expenses of employing full-time household help.

summary.text: Allows an income tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code equal to taxable year to persons employed by the taxpayer to provide household help in and around the taxpayer's home. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 218)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to authorize deduction from gross income for certain expenses of employing full-time household help.
